Movie summary: A mob hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa.
Title: The Irishman

Movie summary: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.
Title: Frozen II

Movie summary: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.
Title: Knives Out
